result.title: Help! How to solve?
result.content: Hello! I've tried to come up with the solution for next problem but I can't. Please help! Problem: we have an array used, in the beginning used[i]=false for all i. And we are given queries: an index i. We should find the smallest index k of array such that used[k]=false and k>=i. For each query we should find this k and after each query do used[i]=true. Thanks for help!
